name: Rooting For You (FrancoStanco)
description:
Rooting For You is a 2-player racing game where two tree compete to reach a pool of water and grow. 

As a little sprout, the player can CHEER for the tree it roots for, speeding it up or BOO the other tree to slow him down. 

Beware not to overdo it because being cheered or booed too much can cause opposed reaction so ANALYZE the trees' FACIAL EXPRESSION and choose the right strategy on the fly! 

If you want, leave a feedback <3 

--Controls-- 

P1: 

Q to CHEER 

W to BOO 

P2:

 O to CHEER

 P to BOO
